content.rendered:
Directed by Sung Jin Ahn. Alicia Chan. Young Heller. Stanley Von Medvey. Eugene Lee. Yu-Won Pang.

Written by Meredith Kecskemety. Meredith Kecskemety. Chris Prynoski. Critical Role. Critical Role. Brandon Auman. Eugene Son. Sam Riegel. Travis Willingham. Kevin Burke. Mae Catt. Chris Wyatt. Jennifer Muro. Marc Bernardin. Ashly Burch. Todd Casey. May Chan.

Cast  Taliesin Jaffe( Percy 2) . Ashley Johnson( Pike 2) . Matthew Mercer( Trinket 2) . Liam O’Brien( Vax’ildan 2) . Marisha Ray( Keyleth 2) . Sam Riegel( Scanlan 2) . Travis Willingham( Grog 2) . Grey Griffin( Delilah Briarwood 1) . Esme Creed-Miles( Cassandra ) . Kelly Hu( Anna Ripley ) . Khary Payton( Sovereign Uriel Tal’Dorei ) . Gina Torres( Keeper Yennen ) . Indira Varma( Lady Allura Vysoren ) . Stephanie Beatriz( Kima ) . Sunil Malhotra( Gilmore ) . Lance Reddick( Thordak ) . Darin De Paul( Stonefell ) . Aisling Franciosi( Kaylie ) . Abubakar Salim( Zanror ) . Stephen Root( Professor Anders ) . Kestrel Riegel( Girl ) . Cree Summer( Raishan ) . Eugene Byrd( Captain Jarett ) . Anjali Bhimani( Head Cleric ) . Will Friedle( Kashaw ) . Mary Elizabeth McGlynn( Zahra ) . Rory McCann( Duke Vedmire ) . Ralph Ineson( Kevdak ) . Domin/epic Monaghan( Archibald Desnay ) . Maximus Riegel( Boy ) . Ike Amadi( Earthbreaker Groon ) . Troy Baker( Syldor ) . Billy Boyd( Garmelie ) . Tony Hale( Sir Fince ) . Logic( Palace Guard ) . Alanna Ubach( Osysa ) . Max Mittelman( Desmond ) . Stacey Raymond( Bryn ) . Fred Tatasciore( Additional voices ) . Henry Winkler( Wilhand Trickfoot ) . David Tennant( General Krieg ) . Aimee Carrero( Ashari Girl ) . Christopher Sabat( Farmer ) . Brandon Auman( Melon Man ) . Felicia Day( Bandit 2 ) . Tony Plana( Kamaljori ) . Cheech Marin( Trinket ) . Parvesh Cheena( Young Dignatary ) . Julie Rei Goldstein( Additional voices ) . Zoe O’Brien( Girl ) . Robbie Daymond( Cerkonos ) . Jayla Lavender Nicholas( Velora ) . Mason Alexander Park( Tavern Keeper ) . Tracie Thoms( Everlight ) . Toks Olagundoye( Devana ) . Courtenay Taylor( Matron of Ravens ) . Sumalee Montano( Highbearer Vord ) . Sendhil Ramamurthy( Saundor ) . Janet Varney( Vilya )

Language English.

Producers Brandon Auman. Laura Bailey. Taliesin Jaffe. Ashley Johnson. Ben Kalina. Matthew Mercer. Liam O’Brien. Chris Prynoski. Shannon Prynoski. Marisha Ray. Sam Riegel. Travis Willingham. Tony Salama. Eugene Son. Jennifer Muro. Erin Eunsung Kim.

Production Amazon Studios. Critical Role Productions. Titmouse.

Creator Chris Prynoski(developed for television by). Critical Role.

Number of Seasons 3

Number of Episodes 25

Status OnGoing (2022–)
